title.value: Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Health Check - Chronic Disease Ageing

valueString.value: Assessment of chronic disease associated with ageing

text.value: For older people with chronic disease and/or conditions associated with ageing, consider assessing: Osteoporosis risk; Falls risk; Balance, coordination and mobility; Pain; Nutrition; Regularity of chronic disease management and review

valueString.value:
For older people with chronic disease and/or conditions associated with ageing, consider assessing:
  • Osteoporosis risk
  • Falls risk
  • Balance, coordination and mobility
  • Pain
  • Nutrition
  • Regularity of chronic disease management and review
Mark section as complete
